install.name: Simple File Upload v1.3
install.author: Anders Wasen
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Anders Was√©n. All rights reserved.
install.description: A simple upload module. Will allow a user to upload a file to the given folder fetched from the parameter settings.

param.name: upload_location
param.label: Default Upload Location
param.description: This is the directory where uploaded files are placed if there are no user directories given below (NB! Server path, not web URL)

param.name: upload_maxsize
param.label: Max. Upload Size (bytes)
param.description: This is the maximum allowed upload file size in bytes

param.name: upload_capthca
param.label: Use Captcha
param.description: Force the user to add a Captcha code to be able to upload.

param.name: upload_capthcacase
param.label: CaSe-iNsEnSiTiVe Captcha
param.description: Ignore case for Captcha code.

param.name: upload_capthcacasemsg
param.label: Show message for CaSe-iNsEnSiTiVe Captcha
param.description: Show a small text that Captcha code is CaSe-insensitive (Only when CaSe-iNsEnSiTiVe Captcha is used).

param.name: upload_email
param.label: Send e-mail at upload
param.description: If you want an e-mail confirmation sent out when there is a new upload enter the e-mail address here (use comma between addresses to add more than one). Leave it blank to not send e-mail.

param.name: upload_emailmsg
param.label: Show 'message sent' to user
param.description: Write 'message sent' on pop-up so user knows Admin has been notified.

param.name: upload_emailhtml
param.label: Use HTML formated e-mail
param.description: Send e-mail in HTML format, else plain-text is used.

param.name: upload_fileexist
param.label: If file exist
param.description: Operation to take incase the uploaded file already exists. Backup - Copies to old file with a new name (adds date); Replace - Removes the existing file; Fail - Notify user the upload failed due to existing file.

param.name: upload_multi
param.label: Allow multiple upload
param.description: Allow user to add files dymamically and upload at the same time.

param.name: upload_maxmulti
param.label: Max. for multiple uploads
param.description: This is the maximum allowed number of files to upload at one time. Leave blank for unlimited.

param.name: upload_startmulti
param.label: Number of start for multiple
param.description: This is the number of files to show from start. Leave blank or zero to only show one.

param.name: upload_filetypes
param.label: Allowed filetypes (separate by semi-colon). Asterisk (*) allows any type.
param.description: This is a list of allowed filetypes (separated by semi-colon). Put a [*] (asterisk) to allow any type.

param.name: upload_blacklist
param.label: Blacklisted file-extensions (separate by space)
param.description: This is a list of blacklisted file extensions (separated by semi-colon). Leave it blank to allow any type.

param.name: upload_doubleext
param.label: Block double extension
param.description: This blocks any double extension upload, e.g. MyFile.php.jpg which is commonly used to try and insert hostile code. It is strongly recommended to block this!

param.name: upload_phpext
param.label: Block double PHP extension
param.description: This blocks any double extension upload using filename.php.*** which is commonly used to try and insert hostile code. It is strongly recommended to block this!

param.name: upload_gifcomment
param.label: Block PHP GIF comments
param.description: This blocks any GIF comments that contains PHP tags. It is strongly recommended to block this!

param.name: upload_donate
param.label: Do you like it?
param.description: Feel like showing your appreciation? (v1.3.3.10)

param.name: settingids
param.label: Allowed users
param.description: This is a list of users allowed to upload files.

param.name: upload_usernameddir
param.label: Use User Named Directories
param.description: Will use sub-directory for selected users named as username

param.name: upload_useundusername
param.label: Use users name for directories
param.description: Will use the users name and not username for sub-directories created for User Named Directories. Users names MUST be unique, else files will be uploaded into the same directory!

param.name: upload_usernameddirdefault
param.label: ONLY show user named directory
param.description: Will omit the default directory from directory list. Directory list will only be shown if User Defined Directory is also used

param.name: upload_userlocation
param.label: User named directories root path
param.description: This is the directory where uploaded files for user specific files are placed (NB! Server path, not web URL)

param.name: upload_createdir
param.label: Allow Create Directory (if missing)
param.description: Will allow SFU to create User directories, else the directories must be manually created

param.name: settingidsund
param.label: User named directories for these users
param.description: This is a list of users who will have user named directories.

param.name: settingidsudd
param.label: Userdefined directories for these users
param.description: This is a list of users who will have user defined directories.

param.name: upload_unzip
param.label: Allow unzip/untar on server
param.description: Use unzip/untar for archives (going to Upload Location above).

param.name: upload_useformsfields
param.label: Use Form Fields
param.description: Shows the user text-boxes to fill in for each file they want to upload.

param.name: upload_formfields
param.label: Form fields
param.description: You can add fields for the user to fill in with information about the uploaded files. Fields can only be text-boxes and names separated by semi-colon can only contain letters A-Z, 0-9, space, dash (-) and underscore (_).

param.name: upload_formfieldsfile
param.label: Form fields file name
param.description: You can add all Form Fields information into the same file (for some image galleries). Add a file name and all information will get collected into the same file. File name will be the first parameter, followed by the Form Fields.

param.name: upload_formfieldsdiv
param.label: Form fields divider
param.description: You can add a Form Fields divider for the above file (for some image galleries a pipe sign is used).

param.name: upload_showdircontent
param.label: Show files in directory
param.description: Shows a list of files in the pop-up after uploading.

param.name: upload_disablegdlib
param.label: Diable the GD library functions
param.description: This will mean you are not able to resize images, create thumbs, but it will boost performance, especially on large size files.

param.name: upload_disablegdthreshold
param.label: GD library size limit
param.description: This is the threshold (max size in bytes) for where GD library should not be used. Set to zero for no threshold.

param.name: upload_username
param.label: Username for validation
param.description: You can set a username (not Joomla user) that must match this for a user to be allowed to upload files.

param.name: upload_password
param.label: Password
param.description: This is the password to go wih the above user.

param.name: upload_jqueryinclude
param.label: Load jQuery through Joomla
param.description: This will load jQuery through Joomla or nativly (hard).

param.name: upload_jquery
param.label: Prevent jQuery 1.4.3 loading
param.description: This will exclude jQuery from loading in Simple File Upload. There are other extensions/templates that can cause conflicts, use this to eliminate any jQuery conflicts.

param.name: upload_nohtmlencoding
param.label: Disable htmlentities for form fields
param.description: This will not use htmlentities for Form Fields. You will then get data saved as the inputted data instead of html encoded.

param.name: upload_replacetag
param.label: Replace tags in Form Fields text
param.description: Replace any tag (less-than, greater-than) to html entities. This might be good if htmlentities is set to disabled to avoid risk of hacking.

param.name: settingbackup
param.label: Backup/Restore all settings
param.description: You can save a copy of all settings and use that to restore back if you update or move the Simple File Upload module.

param.name: upload_mailfrom
param.label: From e-mail address
param.description: If you are having problems sending e-mails from Simple File Upload try adding a "real" e-mail address form teh same domain as your server.

param.name: upload_redirect
param.label: Redirect URL
param.description: A URL for redirect of browser after upload. Can not be used with pop-up or advanced pop-up.

param.name: upload_stdbrowse
param.label: Standard Browse button
param.description: Use the standard Browse button and not image

param.name: upload_filewidth
param.label: File textbox width (chars)
param.description: The width in number of characters of the file text-box (only for the standard browse button).

param.name: upload_capthcaheight
param.label: Captcha image height
param.description: The height of the Captcha image.

param.name: upload_capthcawidth
param.label: Captcha image width
param.description: The width of the Captcha image.

param.name: upload_capthcabg
param.label: Captcha Background colors (RGB 0-255)
param.description: You can set the background color for the CAPTCHA image. Start value and end value must be set, values allowed are 0-255 where 0 is black and 255 is white. Color is then randomized using start-end values.

param.name: upload_bgcolor
param.label: Pop-up background color
param.description: The background color of the information pop-up

param.name: upload_popshowpath
param.label: Show filename/path
param.description: Show the filename and path of uploaded file.

param.name: upload_popcaptchamsg
param.label: Show faulty Captcha pop-up
param.description: Show the message about faulty Captcha in the pop-up,not in the Module window.

param.name: upload_popshowbytes
param.label: Show file-size in bytes
param.description: Show the file-size in bytes.

param.name: upload_showerrmsg
param.label: Show error message
param.description: Show a detailed error message to the user.

param.name: upload_maximgwidth
param.label: Max. pixel width for image
param.description: (NB! Requires GD Libraries) If this value (in pixels) for an image, width or height, is exceeded the image will be resized to this set value.

param.name: upload_maximgheight
param.label: Max. pixel height for image
param.description: (NB! Requires GD Libraries) If this value (in pixels) for an image, width or height, is exceeded the image will be resized to this set value.

param.name: upload_compressimg
param.label: Compression ratio for image
param.description: (NB! Requires GD Libraries) Compress JPEG and PNG image to this value (between 0-100 where 100 is best quality and 90 is default). Leave blank to leave JPEG image as uploaded original compression. Image quality WILL get impacted!

param.name: upload_thumbcreate
param.label: Create thumbnail image
param.description: (NB! Requires GD Libraries) Automatically create thumbnail images.

param.name: upload_thumbsize
param.label: Pixel size for thumbnail
param.description: (NB! Requires GD Libraries) The pixel size for a thumbnail of an image, give size as e.g. 30x50 where 30 is the width and 50 the height.

param.name: upload_thumbname
param.label: Thumbnail postfix name
param.description: (NB! Requires GD Libraries) This is the name to be appended to the original filename for thumbnails. The thumbnail is saved in teh same directory as the original image.

param.name: sfu_autorefreshsfl
param.label: Auto-refresh Simple File Lister
param.description: If you are using Simple File Lister and are uploading to a moitored directory Simple File Upload can automaticaly refresh the file list.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Module Class Suffix

param.name: upload_debug
param.label: Show debug messages
param.description: Will post several messages which will help debugging in case of any problem.
